author: ehu

author: mbk
msg: * configure.in: Produce a less misleading error message when it appears that
BDB has been placed in-tree.
Patch by: Mason Thomas <mlt_svn@sbcglobal.net>
(Tweaked by me.)

author: cmpilato
msg: Add support for SMTP AUTH in the SMTPOutput class if the user supplies
and username and password.
Patch by: Matthew Gregan <kinetik@orcon.net.nz>
* tools/hook-scripts/mailer/mailer.py:
Use SMTP AUTH in the SMTPOutput class if a username and password
have been supplied in the config file.
* tools/hook-scripts/mailer/mailer.conf.example:
Add example of SMTP AUTH configuration.

author: cmpilato
msg: Make 'svnadmin lstxns' and 'svnadmin rmtxns' a little more robust (the
former by not eating up the available locks, the latter by not halting
the whole operation just because of one problematic removal).
* subversion/libsvn_fs/revs-txns.c
(svn_fs_list_transactions): Don't use a Berkeley DB transaction to
do the cursor walk on the Subversion 'transactions' database.
* subversion/svnadmin/main.c
(cmd_table): Teach 'rmtxns' to accept the --quiet option (now that
it has output).
(subcommand_rmtxns): Make the 'rmtxns' subcommand more resilient to
problematic situations.  Rather than die the first time a problem
occurs, print an error and continue processing other txns.  Also,
print successful removals (unless hushed).
* subversion/include/svn_fs.h
(svn_fs_abort_txn, svn_fs_purge_txn): Document these a little better.

author: ehu
msg: Minor FAQ page tweak
* www/project_faq.html
Point more-information FAQ item to users list
